analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x06ea5e282f8945e137bafb6324f682e50a7c142a.sol:
	Contract CodeOfTalentToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x06ea5e282f8945e137bafb6324f682e50a7c142a.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

CodeOfTalentToken.pullOut (/unique_contracts/0x06ea5e282f8945e137bafb6324f682e50a7c142a.sol#258-262) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(owner,_amount) (/unique_contracts/0x06ea5e282f8945e137bafb6324f682e50a7c142a.sol#259-260)
